publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-441 Brian Adam: Planning Appeals—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to change the appeals procedure for planning applications to make the reporter the convener of an independent committee rather than the sole arbiter of appeals.
S2M-441 Planning Appeals (lodged on 1 October 2003) Michael Matheson*

S2M-441 Brian Adam: Planning Appeals—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to change the appeals procedure for planning applications to make the reporter the convener of an independent committee rather than the sole arbiter of appeals. Supported by: Michael Matheson
S2M-441 Planning Appeals (lodged on 1 October 2003) Alex Neil*
S2M-441 Planning Appeals (lodged on 1 October 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Mr Rob Gibson*, Mike Pringle*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-441 Planning Appeals (lodged on 1 October 2003) Christine Grahame*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-441 Planning Appeals (lodged on 1 October 2003) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
